page.title: 01FARMING LIFE
page.content: In square 15 there was a farm called Dedwyddfa which was owned by Mr and Mrs Owens. Mr and Mrs Owens have lived there for thirty three years. Many years ago Mr Owens grandparents owned it which therefore means that it is over 100 years old. They own 85 acres of land which is mostly grazing land for their sheep and horses. Mr Owens does not grow crops for he works most of the day. Mrs Owens does most of the work on the farm : early morning she feeds the animals, late morning she cleans around the farm and throughout the day she works in the house cleaning and baking. Mrs Owens bakes all her food herself e.g.bread, pastry, pies and cakes. Mrs Owens would not like to live in the city because she would miss the peace and quiet and miss her animals.
